name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: The relevant departments have deleted the information on nucleic acid testing

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the condemnation of a famous domestic novel "Go Girl" has intensified. Netizens accused the novel of seriously insulting China and glorifying the war of aggression against China.
It is reported that this novel has been translated into many languages and won the French Goncourt High School Student Award. It was recommended by then French President Jacques Chirac to then Chinese Vice President Hu Jintao.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Please remember that there are still some young people being held in custody

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
I saw a post on Weibo:
The person who was still at loggerheads with the lying bandits last month has watched The Wandering Earth 2 three times in a packed cinema this month.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Tien022613 Let me put it this way, for contemporary little pinks, Zhang Yimou is just the national teacher of the last era, but Liu Cixin's works are the Bible of this era.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sorry, I apologize to everyone, Lei Jun's video is from a year ago. The review was not strict, it has been deleted, please pay attention in the future

content:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @daoguodexingba If your party admitted its mistakes like me, there would be no need for everyone to take to the streets holding up blank papers

content: @OM89dt @SiyuChe70100822 I really can't say it's good. I don't know when it will be released in Italy.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @6SunKing9 @Tien022613 I said that the little pinks think it is the Bible, but do ordinary readers think it is the Bible? Why do they have to claim it?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @dbezuqun This is not fiction, but a scene that actually happened during the Fukushima nuclear leak in Japan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @LiYing_2015 If it is for human reproduction, shouldn't the two males eat each other to fight for mating rights? Why do they eat females?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@6SunKing9 @Tien022613 First of all, there are a lot of pinks among Liu Cixin's fans, and on the Internet they are the group that likes to quote the original text in the book to interpret what is happening in reality, which just fits my metaphor that "Liu Cixin's book is their Bible for little pinks."
Secondly, the little pinks think my tweets are shit, but that's just what they think, not that my tweets are shit, thank you.
